name: 病毒恶化
description:
Virus Crisis is a Roguelike RPG strategy indie game with abundant stories and endings. In the zombie virus outbreaking apocalypse, you will be a high school student who has to collect resources to build a surviver base and help survivers to be your surviving hopes. These survivers can be good or evil, you’ll experience different events and stories based on every choice you make.

【Roguelike elements make every game a whole new experience】
Virus Crisis includes elements of roguelike, strategy, collection and random events. In every new adventure, you will encounter different randomly generated game map, partners, and skills. By exploring the map and completing missions, you can experience different events and affairs between survivers, then have unimaginable endings together.

【Gal game of apocalypse. Flirting with survivers and build relationships.】
In the despairing apocalypse, there are few survivers expecting you to lead and guide them. There are lots of communications between you and survivers could happen. Based on your choice of communication, survivers may get to like/dislike you, then they will help / cheat you. Or... they may give you their hearts.

【No best strategy, you need to make your own surviving guide.】
Random elements are everywhere in the game. From the start of the game, you are facing numbers of choices. Should I establish a base to increase the ability against zombies or should I search for survivers and resources? There's no true answer. Everything is based on your decision, The only thing you can do is seizing the seed of hope and trust every decision you make. Develop your own surviving guide.
